conditioning_regimen: Reduced intensity conditioning with fludarabine and busulfan
problem_list: Pancytopenia secondary to chemotherapy,Resolution of diarrhea,Stable graft-versus-host prophylaxis

problem_list: Dyspnea,Diffuse Bilateral Pulmonary Opacities,Transaminitis of unclear etiology,Male Breast Cancer,AML post alloBMT,Aspergillosis risk

medications_discharge: Acyclovir 400 mg PO Q8H,FoLIC Acid 1 mg PO DAILY,Tacrolimus 0.5 mg PO 2X/WEEK (MO,TH),Voriconazole 350 mg PO Q12H start after 450 mg doses completed
